h1_title: The Beguiling Chant of the Pagoda Realm
content: Move slowly through the darkened hall and be ready for ambushes from Abominations, Withered Corpses, and Cyan Bats on the ceiling.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Pagoda_Realm_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'The Beguiling Chant of the Pagoda Realm', specifically from the subsection 'Lower Pagoda (Level 2)'.
The content is as follows:
Move slowly through the darkened hall and be ready for ambushes from Abominations, Withered Corpses, and Cyan Bats on the ceiling.
